question.title: Kafka Error: SerializationException: Error retrieving Avro value schema for id 2 - ONLY some records in Partition
question.body:
I'm running a kafka consumer that experienced the issue below with a few records within a a Topic partition. The problem persisted until manually changed the offset to keep consuming from. The rest of the records before and after a few offsets are properly consumed. The code/schema has not changed and the error shows in the Kafka SMM when I try to visualize these records using avro.

I'm trying to figure out what could be the root cause of this error.

time=2025-04-23T09:03:59.700+0000, level=ERROR, thread=Default Executor-thread-1295, caller=ServiceX, service=, txid=, correlation=, message=Error occurred while retrieveing messages from kafka org.apache.kafka.common.errors.RecordDeserializationException: Error deserializing key/value for partition TopicName-1 at offset 1284542. If needed, please seek past the record to continue consumption. at org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.internals.CompletedFetch.parseRecord(CompletedFetch.java:309) ~[org.apache.kafka-kafka-clients-7.6.0-ccs.jar:?] ... 20 lines omitted ... Caused by: org.apache.kafka.common.errors.SerializationException: Error retrieving Avro value schema for id 2 ... 7 lines omitted ... Caused by: io.confluent.kafka.schemaregistry.client.rest.exceptions.RestClientException: null; error code: 0
